article_title: Israel investigates after its soldiers filmed throwing bodies off roof
sentence: Israel's  military  has  launched  an  investigation  after  its  soldiers  were  filmed  throwing  the  bodies  of  three  dead  Palestinians  off  a  rooftop  during  a  raid  in  the  occupied  West  Bank.
